item.title: By: Brian O'Malley
item.dc:creator: Brian O'Malley
item.description: Unfortunately I also missed it due to my very expectant better half not feeling all that great that evening - did'nt fancy being 140 miles away. Sounds like it was a great gig and well done!
item.content:encoded: Unfortunately I also missed it due to my very expectant better half not feeling all that great that evening – did’nt fancy being 140 miles away. Sounds like it was a great gig and well done!

item.title: By: paul
item.dc:creator: paul
item.description:
How was the MiniBar event Robin?
I wasn't up for it but would have liked to meet up with some more Irish folk in the UK. I'm based in Guildford, Surrey, so if you or anyone else is in town give me a shout.
item.content:encoded:
How was the MiniBar event Robin?

I wasn’t up for it but would have liked to meet up with some more Irish folk in the UK. I’m based in Guildford, Surrey, so if you or anyone else is in town give me a shout.

item.title: By: Robin Blandford
item.dc:creator: Robin Blandford
item.description:
I was hoping to go but I'm flying the reverse direction on the 1st back to Ireland for the weekend! Pity!
Anyway - I'll be at London MiniBar tonight and might post a brief report here on anything of Irish interest.
item.content:encoded:
I was hoping to go but I’m flying the reverse direction on the 1st back to Ireland for the weekend! Pity!

Anyway – I’ll be at London MiniBar tonight and might post a brief report here on anything of Irish interest.
